title: Heart of the Canadian Rockies
inclusions_evidence: Transport by air-conditioned motorcoach with free Wi-Fi
Entrance fee to Banff National Park and Jasper National Park
Tickets for the Icefields Explorer Experience at Columbia Icefields

items.label: Entrance fee to Banff National Park
Entrance fee to Jasper National Park

other.notes: Additional costs for park entrances and activities.

reasoning: The deal includes guided tours and park entrances, which can add value, but lacks flight inclusion and specific hotel pricing.
